name: Realm Battle
description:
Welcome to realm battle, a massive battle royale set in the royale universe where player compete to survive!

Realm Battle game is now on free to play, with a combination of classic battle royale games and world of bad guys inspired classes.

Players can get them in-game hands on traditional weaponry, such as firearms, as well as exotic fantasy based ones.

Be the last Champion standing in battle royale! Choose a loot deadly weapons and powerful abilities to create your own Champion. Explore a fantasy world mission to mission, and craft game-changing legendary gear. Can you survive the first 100-person fantasy?

+ easy to play but still have decent skill cap

+ simple and clear environment
